name: Culminating
description:
GitHub Link: https://github.com/sundirrala/Game2023-CulminatingAssignment

  1. How to Play: Use W/A/S/D to move, and the left mouse button to interact with buttons! Get random encounters when you're out in the forest and battle!
  2. Credits: Ramin Amiri Student #101190944, Nisara Drahman Student #101120917
  3. DevLog: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0yZFTWSpsf8&feature=youtu.be or check out our devlog post!
